title: Team Conflict During Product Launch
content: While working on a high-stakes product launch, our cross-functional team disagreed on the prioritization of key features. Marketing emphasized customer feedback, while engineering pushed back due to technical constraints.

title: Escalating Tension and Misalignment
content: The disagreement created tension, causing delays in decision-making and risking our launch timeline. The lack of alignment was impacting team morale and productivity.

title: Facilitating Constructive Dialogue
content: I proposed a structured meeting to surface everyone's concerns and objectives. By actively listening, identifying common goals, and encouraging empathy, I facilitated a compromise that aligned technical feasibility with customer needs.

title: Achieving Consensus and On-Time Delivery
content: The team agreed on a phased rollout strategy that balanced feature requests and technical limitations. As a result, we launched on time with a roadmap that addressed all stakeholder concerns.

title: Key Takeaway: Turning Conflict into Collaboration
content: By creating space for open communication and focusing on shared goals, I transformed conflict into collaboration. This experience reinforced my belief in proactive facilitation and empathetic leadership.
